short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Oktodoc gives access to reliable health information online using website rating and recommendation systems.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Do you “google” your symptoms? Are you tired of wasting time searching for a reliable health information on the internet? Do you want a high-quality and safe medical information online?
If you have answered “yes” to any of the questions above, then Oktodoc is for YOU.

Oktodoc is an innovative web browser extension, which will help you access verified and reliable health information online. Our unique OktoScore algorithm assigns a ranking system to medical websites based on quality and safety of the information. Importantly, OktoScore is a cumulative community scoring system, which all our users contribute to. Every time you visit a health-related website you will be able see whether it has got a positive or a negative OktoScore and you will have an opportunity to give your own rating score from 0 to 5.

Rated health information portals are also regularly reviewed by our team of experts. "Expert Verified" label is assigned to all websites, which pass the review process.

We believe that transparency of information is super important when it comes to health. This is why Oktodoc will show you: if a particular health website is up to date and whether it is funded by the government, charity or a private company.

Last but not least, Oktodoc's unique algorithm will suggest similar health websites to users, based on their interests, for further reading and education. With only one click you will be redirected to another website with high OktoScore rating and within the same area of health.

We hope that you download and enjoy using Oktodoc!
